content.text: Leech

Toxicity-fueled melee brawler. Abilities focus on weaponizing contamination, surviving at high toxicity, and making physical contact a threat beyond raw damage. Distinct from augment Burn/Bleed mechanics — abilities are trained techniques that complement the reactor.
T1 — Baseline (Free)
Toxic Touch (Passive): Your unarmed strikes and melee attacks apply +1 Toxicity to the target on hit. You’re leaking rift energy through your skin. This is in addition to any weapon effects.
T2 — Pick from (300 cr each)
Pressure Tolerance (Passive): The first Toxicity threshold’s negative effect is reduced by half (round down). Your body adapts to what kills others.
Siphon Strike (Passive): When you hit an enemy in melee, heal 1 HP. Not per attack — per hit. Consistent melee contact keeps you alive.
Toxic Resilience (Passive): While above 50% Toxicity, gain +1 Armor. Your contaminated flesh is denser, harder. The rift is reinforcing you.
Contaminating Blow (Active, 1 AP): Your next melee attack applies +3 Toxicity to the target on hit (instead of +1 from Toxic Touch). Concentrated dose.
Vent (Active, 1 AP): Reduce your Toxicity by 2. The excess bleeds off as visible rift energy discharge. Can be used in combat without hitting anyone. Emergency pressure release.
Adrenaline Spike (Passive): When you take damage that puts you below 50% HP, immediately gain +1 AP this turn (once per encounter). Pain triggers a burst of contaminated energy.
T3 — Pick from (600 cr each)
Toxic Aura (Passive): Enemies that start their turn within Close range of you gain +1 Toxicity. You’re radiating contamination. You are the environmental hazard.
Metabolize (Active, 1 AP): Consume a condition affecting you (Poison, Bleed, Stun, Hex) and convert it to +2 Toxicity. The condition is removed. You eat the bad stuff and turn it into fuel.
Reactor Surge (Active, 2 AP): Gain +3 Toxicity. Until end of your next turn, all your melee attacks deal +2 damage per die (flat, after armor). Voluntary overdose for burst damage.
Corrosive Blood (Passive): When an enemy hits you with a melee attack, they take 1d4 damage (armor applies). Your blood is toxic. Hitting you costs something.

Leech Grip (Active, 1 AP): Your next melee attack, if it hits, Grapples the target. While grappled by you, the target takes +2 Toxicity at the start of each of their turns. You hold on and pump them full of contamination.
Deadman’s Pulse (Passive): If you are downed (0 HP), you emit a toxicity pulse. All enemies within Close range gain +3 Toxicity. Even dying, you’re dangerous.
Toxic Immunity (Passive): You are immune to Poison conditions from enemy attacks. External toxins don’t affect you — your body is already saturated with worse.
T4 — Pick from (1,000 cr each)

Meltdown (Active, 4 AP): Gain +10 Toxicity. All enemies within Close range gain +5 Toxicity. All allies within Close range (including you) take 2d6 damage (armor-bypassing). You deliberately overload your system and irradiate the area. Once per encounter. The nuclear option.
Symbiosis (Passive): While above 75% Toxicity, gain +2 to Chrome and Grit (and their associated bonuses). You’re no longer fighting the contamination — you’re merging with it.
Endless Hunger (Passive): Siphon Strike now heals 2 HP per hit instead of 1. Additionally, when you down an enemy in melee, heal HP equal to their Grit stat (minimum 2). You consume what you kill.

Walking Reactor (Passive): Your Toxic Aura range extends to Medium. Additionally, you can choose to increase Toxic Aura to +2 Toxicity per turn (affecting allies too). The area around you becomes uninhabitable for anyone without protection.
